title: Danskebåten
overview: Danskebåten is a docusoap showcasing the whole spectrum of life aboard Stena Saga, from the people in the engine room to the captain on the bridge, and the rest of the crew that work so that the passengers get the best trip possible. And of course, there are also meetings with many of the guests, whether they are families on a trip or regular travelers with many crossings a year.
